DOC.brief_summary: To study the association of Genetic Polymorphisms with Lung Cancer Risk in Tianjin Population.
DOC.brief_title: GWAS Research of Lung Cancer in Tianjin
DOC.detailed_description: Eligibility criteria: - nonsmoker - female - age between 35 and 80 - no other types of tumors history - frequency-matched cases and controls on gender and age Outcome measures: - OR(odds ratio) - RR(risk ratio) - CI(confidence interval) - SAS software
DOC.criteria: Nonsmall cell lung cancer Age from 35 to 80 years old Female Nonsmokers Frequencymatched on age and gender Previous medical history of cancer Previous radiotherapy Previous chemotherapy
